secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:same_jsact_Chapter_8_0:Experiment with shuffleboard] pucks to determine if momentum can be conserved.
2. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_g661:conservation of momentum].
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_tang_question:determine the velocity of an object] using conservation of momentum.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37458:Calculate] the final momentum of an object using conservation of momentum.
2. [OBJ:qc_37459:Calculate] the final momentum of an object when two objects are moving before and after the collision using conservation of momentum.
